Full Time, Contract (4 months) Location: Calgary, AB The Opportunity Mawer Investment Management is seeking a high curiosity Applied AI & Automation Summer Student to help our Operations team streamline their workflows and strengthen controls. You will build and test practical automations using a low-code / workflow automation platform to reduce manual touchpoints in trade support, reconciliations, data quality checks, and client reporting processes. Role Responsibilities • Work with current Operations experts to design and implement workflow operations • Find use cases where AI could improve current processes • Assist in building AI agents to streamline tasks • Triage pilot issues, monitor agent/automation performance, and escalate risks promptly with recommended solutions Document automations so they can be maintained for future use • Why Mawer? • Directly contribute to the firm's growth as a global, independent investment manager. • Learn and work within a high-performing team that has consistently delivered exceptional long-term investment results and high levels of client satisfaction. • Be a part of a meritocracy in which the quality of ideas supersedes hierarchy; where every role is valued, and every voice heard.
